wikipedia_page.main: Sydney "Syd" Maurice Lucas (21 September 1900 – 4 November 2008) was, at age 108, one of three remaining British Tommies of World War I (along with Harry Patch and Netherwood Hughes), although the war ended before he was sent to fight.

response: * 4 November – Syd Lucas, World War I survivor (born 1900)
